toys.name: Enchanted Unicorn
toys.description: A beautiful unicorn with a flowing rainbow mane. Press its ear to hear it sing and light up.

toys.name: Wizard's Wand
toys.description: A magical wand that lights up and makes whimsical sound effects. A must-have for aspiring wizards.

toys.name: Fairy Tea Party Set
toys.description: Invite your friends to a delightful fairy tea party with this charming tea set. Includes teapot, cups, and saucers.

toys.name: Dragon Knight Action Figure
toys.description: An action figure of a brave knight riding a fearsome dragon. Moveable limbs for epic battles.
